data.message: Why not make fb messenger a choice?! I deleted FB messenger and started to hate FB.

replies.message: Hey Anne. We want to make everyday messaging with the most important people in your life fast, reliable, useful and fun, and we're confident Messenger is the way to do that. We hope you’ll try it and let us know what you think. Learn more here: http://on.fb.me/1uFk239 -Ryan
Myself along with a host 9f other people I know feel like it's an invasion of privacy we shouldn't have to give access to everyone else in order to get direct access to our messager
